cleaned_text: Hand blended essential spiritual herbs, specially created to eliminate all manner of psychic or spiritual attacks. This Spiritual Healing Tea boosts spiritual and physical energy to raise your vibrations and frequencies to higher spiritual levels. Boosts energy Gives clarity and focus. Helps to get grounded Rooted and centered Improves sleep Eliminates procrastination and laziness. Eliminates sleep paralysis Raises frequency Raises your vibration Removes brain fog Relief from Panic attacks Relief from addiction of any kind Reduce cholesterol naturally Reduce blood sugar naturally Helps alleviate insomnia. Eliminate spiritual and bodily weakness. Relief from bloating and stomach discomfort. Relieves joint pains Enhance lucid dreaming Cleanses and heals aura Cleanses negative energies in your subconscious (soul) 100% Natural Herbs No perfume No chemicals No scents No flavors No filters No oils No sprays No Additives Directions: Take twice daily on an empty stomach. Steep in hot water for up to 15 minutes. NOT to be used during pregnancy or breastfeeding. NOT for children below 16 years of age. Each pack contains 30 bags. We offer free domestic shipping in the US.
